cveId.description: The official CVE identifier contains the string 'CVE', followed by the year, followed by a 4 to 19 digit number. Note that the year-part of the identifier should indicate either the year the vulnerability was discovered, or the year the CVE ID is published in. CVE IDs must be unique.

cweId.description: CWE ID of the CWE that best describes this problemType entry.

CVSSv3_1_vendor.description: CVSS v3.1 string from the vendor.

CVSSv4_vendor.description: CVSS v4.0 string from the vendor.

descriptions.description: Two sets of descriptions that inform the nature of the vulnerability.
